slots.description: The placeholder content for the Picker
slots.name: label

slots.description: The description content for the Picker
slots.name: description

slots.description: Tooltip to to be applied to the the Picker Button
slots.name: tooltip

slots.description: menu items to be listed in the Picker

members.name: forcePopover
members.description: Forces the Picker to render as a popover on mobile instead of a tray.

members.name: pending
members.description: Whether the items are currently loading.

members.name: pendingLabel
members.description: Defines a string value that labels the Picker while it is in pending state.

members.name: willManageSelection
members.description: whether a selection change is already scheduled

members.name: shouldScheduleManageSelection
members.description: when the value changes or the menu slot changes, manage the selection on the next frame, if not already scheduled

members.name: shouldManageSelection
members.description: when an item is added or updated, manage the selection, if it's not already scheduled

members.name: manageSelection
members.description: updates menu selection based on value

events.name: change
events.description: Announces that the `value` of the element has changed
Announces that the overlay has been opened
events.name: sp-opened
